Many 4koma comics are included in between several of the works and even stories that start off seriously are quickly turned on their head. 34d9fa6a-05ff-4138-ac9d-550bdcdeeae5:::||@!@||:::2025-11-10T02:01:39:::||@!@||:::{"id":"34d9fa6a-05ff-4138-ac9d-550bdcdeeae5","title":{"en":"Konami Parody Comic Series Genso Suikoden"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"コナミパロディコミックシリーズ幻想水滸伝"},{"ja-ro":"Konami Parodi Komikku Shirīzu Gensōsuikoden"}],"relatedIds":["099e1d86-4d4d-4543-ac9e-d11a0cebb901"],"description":{"en":"The original Suikoden manga publication, this manga is considered the rarest of all Suikoden manga although it could be considered uncommon rather than truly scarce. It is the only manga released before the Japanese launch of Suikoden II, making the publication entirely focused on characters and situations from the original game.\n\nThis manga is also unique among Suikoden manga to have some of its contents referenced in the Genso Suikoden Genso Shinsho publications, lending some events an air of canon unseen in other releases. Odessa's marriage to Achilles and her turning on the Empire was first chronicled here, as was Ted's marriage and eventual adoption by Teo McDohl.\n\nOther such serious stories litter the publication, however there are many humorous stories as well as 4koma, giving screen time to a series of characters who were generally ignored in future publications."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}
dc589242-4b57-4859-87a6-aefd6871930b:::||@!@||:::2025-11-10T02:01:39:::||@!@||:::{"id":"dc589242-4b57-4859-87a6-aefd6871930b","title":{"en":"Genso Suikoden Caravelle"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"幻想水滸伝 カラベル"},{"ja-ro":"Gensōsuikoden Karaberu"}],"relatedIds":["099e1d86-4d4d-4543-ac9e-d11a0cebb901","861e8b24-e8b0-4fec-91d0-d81b84135a3b"],"description":{"en":"Genso Suikoden Caravelle is the third and final manga collection published by Kadokawa Shoten. Like the others, it is a collection of unconnected manga, mostly humorous, some serious, centered around the general time period of Suikoden II, allowing it to include returning Suikoden characters such as McDohl as well as events from Genso Suikogaiden Volumes 1 \u0026 2.\n\nCompared to its predecessor, Genso Suikoden Brunch, Caravelle takes a more serious tone. Although most of the stories are comedic, several cover more somber moments as well. This volume features eight pages of color artwork (and one additional black-and-white picture). The usual end volume messages from the mangaka is preceded by an information section; a series of promotions for various Suikoden games and soundtracks which was also present in Alliance."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Within their residence, there lie special gardens where all four seasons exist. These serve as a barrier, protecting the imperial capital from evil insects. The caretakers who maintain it are chosen from the four great families, each responsible for one season. Hio lost her parents when she was a child and was taken in by one of the great families, the Harusaki family. She's been bullied by the daughter of the family and is treated worse than a servant. As schemes and conspiracies rise anew within the perilous imperial court, can Saphir uncover the truth and break free from the cycle of despair? And what destiny awaits her and Leander? After centuries of waiting, the long-awaited princess is finally born destined to save the world. Adored by her doting family, she grows up surrounded by love, unaware of the divine power sleeping within her. But when strange dreams begin to haunt her, she starts to question who she truly is and what fate awaits her beyond the warmth of her home."},"links":{"mu":"qqhx0o3","nu":"the-white-tiger-princess-is-not-in-danger","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/62026001"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

d34c6bb6-8251-4fb5-a636-c27a45536df0:::||@!@||:::2025-11-10T02:01:46:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d34c6bb6-8251-4fb5-a636-c27a45536df0","title":{"en":"Slave of Rubelfast"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"루벨파스트의 노예"},{"ko-ro":"Rubelfast-ui Noye"},{"en":"A Slave of Rubelfast"},{"en":"Rubelphast Slave"},{"ru":"Рабыня Рубельфаста"}],"description":{"en":"\"A slave who knows things only a noble would… Who is this girl, really?\"\n\nLilliette, once the Empress of the vast Pardinas Empire, was killed by her lover and found herself reincarnated in the body of a nameless slave girl, roughly 17 years in the past. One day, while quietly running his mercenary group, he meets a genius boy named Sel. A body that had never reacted to women begins to respond only to Sel. Although he denied the reality, convinced he couldn’t possibly like men, he could no longer ignore his racing heart. Sel, who has been living disguised as a man, encounters a striking gentleman who extends a hand. To make a living, Sel hides her gender and joins the group. As she grows increasingly attracted to Lavirus, her benefactor and employer, she buries her feelings because of the vast difference in their social status. 5986c005-ca5e-4e4e-943b-a442e9cdff8d:::||@!@||:::2025-11-10T02:01:46:::||@!@||:::{"id":"5986c005-ca5e-4e4e-943b-a442e9cdff8d","title":{"en":"Sensei no Kaban"},"altTitles":[{"it":"Gli anni dolci"},{"pt":"A Valise do Professor"},{"de":"Der Himmel ist blau, die Erde ist weiß"},{"fr":"Les années douces"},{"es":"Los años dulces"},{"ja":"センセイの鞄"},{"zh":"老师的提包"}],"description":{"en":"Tsukiko, thirty-eight, works in an office and lives alone. One night, she happens to meet one of her former high school teachers, “Sensei” in a local bar. Tsukiko had only ever called him “Sensei” (“Teacher”). He is thirty years her senior, retired, and presumably a widower. Their relationship–traced by Kawakami’s gentle hints at the changing seasons–develops from a perfunctory acknowledgment of each other as they eat and drink alone at the bar, to an enjoyable sense of companionship, and finally into a deeply sentimental love affair.\nAs Tsukiko and Sensei grow to know and love one another, time’s passing comes across through the seasons and the food and beverages they consume together. From warm sake to chilled beer, from the buds on the trees to the blooming of the cherry blossoms, the reader is enveloped by a keen sense of pathos and both characters’ keen loneliness.","it":"In questa sua opera, Taniguchi presta la poesia del proprio tratto a un delicato romanzo giapponese, accolto come un capolavoro dalla critica e dal pubblico francese.\nLa storia de Gli anni dolci è quella di Tsukiko, una donna di trent’anni, che incontra per caso in un bar il suo ormai sessantenne professore di giapponese. L’incontro sarà il primo di molti e, tra passeggiate nei mercatini delle pulci ed escursioni a caccia di funghi e fiori, i due protagonisti scopriranno di essere innamorati a dispetto della differenza d’età. Una delicata storia d’amore raccontata con un’originale ed efficace struttura narrativa che suddivide il plot in diciassette racconti brevi, diciassette momenti romantici uniti dal medesimo filo conduttore: la poesia e l’ineffabilità delle piccole cose semplici che rendono felici."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

89bb6ed7-1f00-40eb-8ef6-5afb549e06da:::||@!@||:::2025-11-10T02:01:46:::||@!@||:::{"id":"89bb6ed7-1f00-40eb-8ef6-5afb549e06da","title":{"en":"Anatagata no Gen ni Modoru Tsumori Wagozaimasen!"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"あなた方の元に戻るつもりはございません!"},{"en":"I Have No Intention of Returning to You!"}],"description":{"en":"Ayako, who worked as an office lady in a black company, was abandoned by her family and boyfriend and died of overwork...But before she knew it, she had entered the world of the otome game she had played in her previous life. However, it seems she was also oppressed in this world, and Angelica, who worked as a chef for the Knights, was falsely accused and fired. To her surprise, it allows her to create potions simply by chanting the word \"create.\" Relying on these potions to survive, Kaede navigates the challenges of this fantastical world while clinging to the hope of one day returning to Japan. Los dos estudiantes universitarios crearon una página donde suben contenido y fingen ser una pareja gay por diversión y por dinero. Desde su nacimiento, Kaim Halsberg fue despreciado como un niño maldito, odiado por todos excepto por su difunta madre y Tii, una doncella que trabajaba para su familia. Mientras su padre y su hermana gemela viven en la mansión familiar, Kaim se vio obligado a residir solo en una cabaña en el bosque. Pero todo cambia cuando cierta \"doctora\" lo ayuda a superar la maldición y a reclamar su poder dormido. Ahora convertido en el \"Rey del Veneno\", Kaim emprende un viaje para cumplir su único deseo… ¡Aunque jamás imaginó que su veneno tendría un efecto tan peculiar en las bellezas que conoce en su camino!"},"links":{"mal":"188845","mu":"hxoj0f5","nu":"the-poison-king-with-the-awakening-of-the-strongest-power-i-command-the-beautiful-maidens-and-become-the-master-of-a-lustful-harem","raw":"https://www.ganganonline.com/title/2400"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

That remained true even as civilization collapsed. One day, a swarm of magical meteorites rained down on Earth, robbing the planet of all its electricity. The advanced society that relied on electricity collapsed in an instant.\n\nAs the world fell into unprecedented chaos, Tairi leisurely carved out one of the meteorites and fashioned a magical wand.——That's right, humanity lost its electricity, but gained magic in return.\n\nIn a collapsed world where electronic devices no longer work, Tairi's dexterity, which allows him to work with precision machinery, could be the key to saving the world——!?\n___\n**Character Designer:** [Kayahara](https://mangadex.org/author/64ef0945-f8d7-47db-a8aa-136fae2a1e7b)","es":"Dairi Kenshi es un hombre que ha vivido únicamente gracias a su habilidad manual. Y eso no cambia ni siquiera cuando la civilización se derrumba. Un día, un grupo de meteoritos mágicos cayó sobre la Tierra, arrebatándole toda la electricidad al planeta. La sociedad avanzada, sostenida por la electricidad, colapsó en un instante. Mientras el mundo se sumía en un caos sin precedentes, Dairi, tranquilamente y por su cuenta, tomó uno de aquellos meteoritos, lo talló y creó una vara mágica. —Sí. La humanidad perdió la electricidad, pero a cambio obtuvo la magia. En un mundo en ruinas donde ya no pueden usarse los dispositivos electrónicos, la destreza de Dairi —capaz de trabajar con la precisión de una máquina de alta gama— ¿se convierte en la clave que podría salvar al mundo?","es-la":"Dairi Kenshi es un hombre que ha vivido únicamente gracias a su habilidad manual. dfa467bc-5fed-46a7-9bd2-644ab508b072:::||@!@||:::2025-12-08T02:02:10:::||@!@||:::{"id":"dfa467bc-5fed-46a7-9bd2-644ab508b072","title":{"ja-ro":"Akuyaku Reijou no Yuigon Jou"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"悪役令嬢の遺言状"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["id"],"description":{"en":"Lielia, the daughter of the wealthy Shubilauts family—owners of the greatest fortune in the kingdom—has her engagement annulled by her fiancé, the First Prince, on the very day of their wedding. Leaving behind only the words, “Farewell, everyone,” she disappears, and shortly afterward, news of her death spreads across the kingdom. But the disturbance only grows worse when her will is revealed: “To the one who marries me, I shall bequeath everything owned by the Shubilauts family.” What is the true meaning behind this will? Nicht nur haben die beiden ein Kind und ein eigenes Anwesen miteinander – ihre ehemals beste Freundin hat ihr außerdem über Jahre hinweg Gift eingeflößt, um sie langsam, aber sicher zu töten. Für ihren Racheplan hofft sie auf eine vorübergehende Zweckehe mit dem blutrünstigen Kriegshelden Herzog Lexion, der sie aus irgendeinem Grund nie aus den Augen zu lassen scheint. And so she bravely seeks the help of the bloodthirsty war hero, Duke Lexion Rosenvester, who was oddly kind to her in her past life. His only conditions are that she ditch her unfaithful husband and enter a permanent marriage with him instead...!","fr":"Brisée en découvrant que son mari la trompe avec sa meilleure amie et l’empoisonne depuis des années, Ceriniel finit par mourir… pour mieux se réveiller dans le passé. Décidée à se venger, elle se tourne vers le redoutable duc Lexion Rosenvester, héros de guerre réputé pour sa cruauté, mais étrangement bienveillant à son égard dans sa vie précédente. Cependant, son aide a un prix: abandonner son époux infidèle et accepter un mariage éternel à ses côtés…","id":"Ceriniel patah hati ketika mengetahui suaminya telah berselingkuh dengan sahabatnya dan diam-diam meracuninya selama bertahun-tahun. Namun, ketika ia meninggal dan terbangun di masa lalu, ia bertekad untuk membalas dendam kepada orang-orang yang mengkhianatinya. Maka, ia dengan berani mencari bantuan pahlawan perang yang haus darah, Duke Lexion Rosenvester, yang anehnya baik padanya di masa lalu. Satu-satunya syaratnya adalah ia harus meninggalkan suaminya yang tidak setia dan menikah dengannya selamanya...!","it":"Il marito che amava, l'unico e solo migliore amico di cui si fidava. Ma sull'orlo della morte, Seriniel capì la verità. Tutto era una cospirazione intessuta di bugie e tradimenti. In quel momento, l'amore si trasformò in odio e lei giurò vendetta. Sull'orlo della disperazione, colui a cui si rivolse fu il duca temuto come il “Cane dell'Imperatore”, spietato e senza pietà, che elimina chiunque si opponga all'autorità imperiale: Lexion Rosenwester. Un uomo più freddo e pericoloso di chiunque altro al mondo. Le condizioni che lui le pose per aiutarla erano solo due: “La prima è che tu abbandoni completamente quell'uomo inutile. E la seconda è...” Così ebbe inizio il pericoloso contratto tra i due. Ma lei non aveva dubbi. 6f81b440-3ece-4d24-ac12-1d460a1a3ca3:::||@!@||:::2025-12-08T02:02:13:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6f81b440-3ece-4d24-ac12-1d460a1a3ca3","title":{"ja-ro":"Futari Machiaruki"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ふたり街あるき"},{"en":"Strolling the City Together"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"When Hinata, a female university student, starts living on her own after entering college, she finds herself in a city that’s perfectly livable but dull and boring. Thinking she’ll just spend the next four years of university here, she shrugs it off… until one day, she encounters Kage, a young man taking photos of seemingly ordinary spots around town.\n\nIntrigued by Kage’s actions, Hinata decides to go on a city-walking adventure with him! As they stroll together, the ordinary city she once found boring begins to reveal unexpected charm… and wonders! By chance, he discovers that the clue to solving the ghost problem lies with his awkward colleague, Go Philip, and in desperation, he invites Philip into his home...","fr":"Hong Yohan vient de réaliser son rêve de devenir propriétaire.\nLe jour de son emménagement, il invite ses amis pour une pendaison de crémaillère et passe sa première nuit dans son nouveau logement, plein d'enthousiasme pour, a sa grande surprise, apercevoir un fantôme.\nPensant au début que c'est juste un cauchemar, Yohan fini rapidement par être tourmanté par ce fantôme apparaissant à toutes heures.\nPar hasard, il découvre qu'un collègue maladroit, Ko Philip, détient un indice pour résoudre son problème de fantôme, et, prêt à tout pour trouver une solution, il invite Philip chez lui..."},"links":{"mu":"i8qoupq","raw":"https://ridibooks.com/books/6033000001"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"pornographic","tags":[{"id":"3bb26d85-09d5-4d2e-880c-c34b974339e9","name":{"en":"Ghosts"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

bb64b3e5-64d1-4d7d-bbd5-e6cd754dd5fa:::||@!@||:::2025-12-08T02:02:13:::||@!@||:::{"id":"bb64b3e5-64d1-4d7d-bbd5-e6cd754dd5fa","title":{"ja-ro":"Mememe no Mememe"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"メメメの滅滅滅ッ！"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["id"],"description":{"id":"Terlahir dari nafsu duniawi manusia, makhluk ini menimbulkan kejadian-kejadian cabul—mereka disebut “Bonnō Kaii.”\nSuatu hari, Kai Eirumi, seorang siswa SMP, difitnah oleh siswi perempuan\ngara-gara insiden cabul yang sebenarnya disebabkan oleh Makhluk Nafsu.\nKarena tidak ada cara untuk membuktikan keberadaan Makhluk Nafsu yang tak terlihat oleh mata manusia,\nKai akhirnya dicap sebagai “mesum,”\ndan tumbuh dengan rasa benci yang kuat terhadap makhluk-makhluk tersebut.\n\nTiga tahun kemudian, bersamaan dengan masuk SMA, Kai direkrut\nke “Klub Pemusnah Makhluk Nafsu,” yang biasa disebut “Klub Mememe,”\nkarena suatu kondisi khusus yang ia miliki,\ndan ia pun mulai bertarung melawan Makhluk Nafsu—!?\nMakhluk cabul harus dihancurkan total!\nSebuah komedi kacau yang dipenuhi berbagai macam kecabulan yang lahir dari nafsu terpendam!","ja":"人々の煩悩から生まれ、ハレンチを発生させる怪異――その名も「煩悩怪異」。男子中学生・家瑠海カイはある日、煩悩怪異が起こしたハレンチにより、女子生徒から冤罪をかけられてしまう。通常、人の目に視えない煩悩怪異の存在を証明する術もなく「変態」としてのレッテルを貼られたカイは、\n煩悩怪異に強い恨みを抱くようになった。それから三年。高校入学と同時に、カイはある特異体質を理由に煩悩怪異壊滅部・通称「メメメ部」にスカウトされ、煩悩怪異と戦うことになるが――!?エッチな怪異は絶対「滅ッ」だ！抑圧された煩悩から繰り出される、多種多様なハレンチ入り乱れコメディ!!"},"links":{"raw":"https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_007215_S/episodes/KC_0072150000200011_E?episodeType=first"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3bb26d85-09d5-4d2e-880c-c34b974339e9","name":{"en":"Ghosts"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}
